articles.author: Vishwanath Hariharan
articles.title: IND vs AUS 2023, 2nd T20I: Greenfield International Stadium Pitch Report, Thiruvananthapuram Weather Forecast, T20 Stats & Records | India vs Australia - Cricket Times
articles.description: India and Australia will lock horns with each other in the second match of the five-game T20I series. The clash will take place at the Greenfield International Stadium in Thiruvananthapuram.
articles.content: India and Australia are all set to take on each other in the second T20I of the five-match series. The highly-anticipated battle will take place at the Greenfield International Stadium in Thiruvanant… [+2042 chars]
